short_description: penang math platform is a learning, tutoring & courses provider based in george town, malaysia.
long_description: to be the centre for excellence in math & mathematical sciences in penang. penang math platform (pmp) , as the name implies, is a mathematics learning centre set up primarily as part of the penang stem initiative, an overall synergistic ecosystem in the state to complement the current educational system (primary schools, secondary schools, vocational schools, colleges and universities) for stem-learning. we also conduct workshops & programmes on math-related activities (math competitions, seminars, workshops and math camps, etc) for all age groups. penang stem is the common platform to bring together the various independent stem learning organizations in acoordinated way to jointly create a synergistic ecosystem in penang that complements our current formal educational system (primary schools, secondary schools, vocational schools, colleges and universities). the centre of excellence of math and mathematical sciences in penang. our flagship free class for pre-schoolers (6 years) to build entry level foundation for math appreciation and inter-personal communication.

generated_description: penang math platform (pmp) is a mathematics learning center located in gelugor, penang. it is part of the penang stem initiative, which aims to complement the current educational system in penang by providing a synergistic ecosystem for stem learning. pmp focuses on mathematics, offering classes from basic to advanced levels, including a flagship japanese math class for pre-schoolers. the center also conducts workshops, seminars, and math camps for all age groups. pmp provides various facilities, including classrooms and an open hall, equipped with necessary amenities. it is a founding member of penang stem, which brings together independent stem learning organizations to enhance educational opportunities in penang.
